title: Old Newspaper Clip on Sexual Exploitation In Madrasa Is Altered
subtitle: Sexually Abused by Maulvi in Lucknow’s Madrasa News Fact Check: Tweet in Hindi with over 4,000 retweets read “If media got some time from Chinmayanand, they should tell this news as well. It is  case of not one, not two,but 52 girls aged eight to 18”
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
A tweet in Hindi with over 4,000 retweets reads: “If media got some time from (covering) Chinmayanand, they should tell this news as well. It is a case of not one, not two, but 52 girls aged eight to 18”.

The tweet carried an alleged newspaper clip which was headlined:“मदरसे में यौन शोषण मौलवी गिरफ्तार, 52 छात्राएं छुड़ाई गयीं”

It translates to “Cleric arrested for sexual exploitation in Madrasa, 52 girls rescued”
